DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Assess Tenofovir Maraviroc Protection Against HIV-1 Cervical Vaginal Explants
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : Six premenopausal healthy volunteer woman 18-49 year age intact uterus cervix . Procedures ( method ) : Subjects give single dose two oral antiretrovirals ( maraviroc 600mg/tenofovir 600 mg ) . Subjects monitor assessed adverse event post-dose . Subjects send home ask return 24 hour . 24 hour post-dose , two vaginal two cervical biopsy obtain . These biopsy place ex-vivo culture system expose HIV . Viral RNA measure two day determine whether tissue protect infection . A final visit safety conduct 7-14 day post-enrollment .
